name: Attack
note:
<Cast Animation: 0>
<setup action>
  clear battle log
  display action
  immortal: targets, true
  perform start
</setup action>

<whole action>
  move user: target, FRONT BASE
  wait for movement
  if user.isActor()
  	motion swing: user
  end
  perform action
  action animation
  wait for animation
  action effect
  death break
</whole action>

<target action>
  death break
</target action>

<finish action>
  immortal: targets, false
  wait for new line
  clear battle log
  perform finish
  wait for movement
  wait for effect
  action common event
</finish action>

name: Fire (Cast)
note:
<Display Text: Fire>
//<speed: console.log('testing')>
<After CTB: user.agi>
<Custom Execution>
this.forgetSkill(15);
</Custom Execution>

name: Chain Lightning (Cast)
note:
<Damage Formula>
// Set the chain multiplier to a value if it doesn't exist.
this._chainmultiplier = this._chainmultiplier || 1.0;
// This is the damage formula.
value = user.mat + 50;
// Apply the chain multiplier to the damage formula.
value *= this._chainmultiplier;
// Reduce the chain multiplier per target.
this._chainmultiplier -= 0.2;
</Damage Formula>

<Custom Target Eval>
// Adds the selected target to the target list.
targets.push(target);
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// Remove the target from the group of candidates.
members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = Math.randomInt(3)+1;
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
    // Remove the member as a viable candidate.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

<Display Text: Chain Lightning>
<Custom Execution>
this.forgetSkill(16);
</Custom Execution>

name: Upgrade: Vitality
note:
<Learn Cost: 1 JP>
<Display Text: Vitality>
<Learn Cost Eval>
user._paramPlus[0] += 10;
user._paramPlus[3] += 1;
user._paramPlus[5] += 1;
user.addHrg(.02)
user.addMrg(.01)
user.addTrg(.01)
user._VSpent = user._VSpent || 0;
user.forgetSkill(19);
user._VSpent += 1;
user.refresh();
</Learn Cost Eval>

note:

user._paramPlus[3] += 1;

name: Upgrade: Magick
note:
<Learn Cost: 1 JP>
<Display Text: Magick>
<Learn Cost Eval>
user._paramPlus[1] += 10;
user._paramPlus[5] += 1;
user.setTgrPlus(.02)
user.addMrg(.02)
user._MSpent = user._MSpent || 0;
user.forgetSkill(22);
user._MSpent += 1;
user.refresh();
</Learn Cost Eval>

name: Upgrade: Reset Character
note:
<Learn Cost: 0 JP>
<Display Text: Reset Character>
<Learn Cost>
Item 5: 1
</Learn Cost>
<Learn Cost Eval>
user._VSpent = user._VSpent || 0;
user._SSpent = user._SSpent || 0;
user._DSpent = user._DSpent || 0;
user._MSpent = user._MSpent || 0;
user.clearParamPlus()
user.clearSParamPlus()
user.clearXParamPlus()
user._baseMaxTp -= 10*user._DSpent;
user.gainJp(user._VSpent);
user.gainJp(user._SSpent);
user.gainJp(user._DSpent);
user.gainJp(user._MSpent);
user._VSpent = 0;
user._SSpent = 0;
user._DSpent = 0;
user._MSpent = 0;
user.forgetSkill(23);
user.refresh();
</Learn Cost Eval>

description:
\fs[25]Inflicts \i[40]\c[6]Encore\c[0], forcing the target to repeat their last
action for 2-5 turns.  Fails if target has not acted.
name: Encore
note:
<setup action>
  clear battle log
  display action
  immortal: targets, true
  perform start
  wait for movement
</setup action>

<whole action>
  perform action
  motion victory: user
 	if target._LastActionId > 0
 	 if eval: target.isactor();
  		motion victory: target
  	end
  	else
  		jump target: 50, 10
  		wait for jump
 		end
  end
  action animation
  wait for animation
  action effect
  death break
</whole action>

<target action>
  eval: console.log('here');
  if eval: target._LastActionId > 0;
 	 if eval: target.isactor();
  		motion victory: target  
  	end
  	else
  		jump target: 50, 10
  		wait for jump
 		end
  end
  eval: console.log('here');
if target._LastActionId > 0
   ADD STATE 35: target, show
end
  death break
</target action>

<follow action>

</follow action>

<finish action>
  immortal: targets, false
  wait for new line
  clear battle log
 	if eval: target._LastActionId > 0;
  	if eval: target.isactor();
  		motion victory: target  
 	 end
 	 else
  		jump target: 50, 10
  		wait for jump
 		end
  end
	eval: console.log('Last ID:' + user._LastActionId);
  //motion wait: user
  perform finish
  wait for movement
  wait for effect
  action common event
</finish action>

description:
Your Intimidating presence makes you a prime target for
enemy attacks.  Increased success at intimidation checks.
